name: Classic Solitaire!
description:
Are you a solitaire enthusiast? Do you want to play it anywhere at any time?

Here is a classic solitaire game for you, while injecting creative features into every level. It will surprise you with its smart settings, ease of play and stunning designs.

*Interesting Gameplay:
- Numerous free games
- Draw 1card or 3cards
- Multiple hints show useful moves
- Unlimited undos
- Challenging achievement
- Global game center leaderboard

*Considerate Ideas:
- Auto-complete to finish a solved game
- Left and right game layout

*Creative designs:
- Changeable backgrounds and card backs
- Simple, fast and sensible game interface

Download and enjoy playing Classic Solitaire!
